column1: Screen reader users: There is 1 figure on this tab called Figure 17: Kidney transplant recipients by type of donor, Canada (excluding Quebec), 2012 to 2021 (percentage of total). The data table used to create this figure starts in cell A12 and ends in cell K15. The notes begin in cell A5 and the source begins in cell A10. A link back to the table of contents is in cell A2.
